name: Mendel
headline: Workflows to empower employees to spend while finance stay in control

founders.name: Alan Karpovsky, Founder
founders.description: Born and raised in Buenos Aires, married, no kids (yet), 1 dog. I'm 30 years old, Software Engineer that doesn’t code. Last year I sold my first company, Herolens, a SaaS creative management platform to Innovid. I was awarded by the Forbes Magazine for the “30 Under 30” Class of 2019 and distinguished by the Bureau of Educational and Cultural Affairs of the U.S. Department of State from over 4000 young professionals from all Latin America.

founders.name: Alejandro Zecler, Founder
founders.description: I'm 31 years old, Industrial Engineer. In 2020 I sold my first company, Zetech (acquired by Visma), a SaaS document management solutions in LATAM. Lover for new technologies, excels at building very strong partner/customer relations.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Mendel**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Mexico City, Mendel is a forward-thinking fintech startup that’s part of Y Combinator's W21 batch. With a focused mission to empower employees in their spending while ensuring that financial oversight remains intact, Mendel is really on to something in the B2B space.

### Core Offerings

Mendel provides a robust platform aimed at simplifying expense management for businesses. Their suite of products includes features like:

- **Expense Management**: Streamlined processes to help track and manage employee expenditures.
- **Recovery and Refunds**: Facilitates hassle-free invoice validation and refunds.
- **Mendel Cards**: Offers smart corporate cards that operate under customizable rules for spending.
- **Integration for Corporate Cards**: Ensures that businesses can adopt digital spending solutions seamlessly.

### Solutions Tailored by Industry

Mendel adopts a tailored approach, providing solutions specific to sectors like logistics and health. They also cater to different roles within companies, such as CFOs and Controllers, ensuring a comprehensive understanding of their clients' needs.

### Team & Leadership

Mendel is a nimble team of five, led by their Group Partner Brad Flora, who brings a wealth of experience to guide the company’s vision and growth strategy.

### A Focused Vision

Mendel's tagline—“Workflows to empower employees to spend while finance stays in control”—sums up their aim succinctly. They enable companies to give their teams the flexibility they need while maintaining stringent financial oversight. This dual focus is what positions Mendel as a vital partner for emerging businesses looking to optimize their spending practices.

### Get to Know Mendel

For those curious to dive deeper into their offerings or to explore partnership opportunities, you can check out their website at [mendel.com](https://mendel.com).

In conclusion, Mendel represents a fresh approach to expense management, emphasizing efficiency without sacrificing control. Their innovative solutions and strategic market positioning make them a standout player in the fintech space—definitely a company to keep an eye on.
